sentence.Network_en: He had been inclined to talkativeness, but gradually he became rather reserved.
sentence.Network_cn: 他过去是比较爱说话的, 但慢慢变得沉默寡言了.

sentence.Network_en: Maybe you have social faults such as snobbishness, talkativeness, and, etc. which drive away new acquaintances.
sentence.Network_cn: 也许你有社交方面的缺点,诸如势利 、 饶舌 、 出语粗俗等,使你的新相识退避三舍.

sentence.Network_en: Extraverts tend to possess skills such as sociability, talkativeness, and a high interest in affiliation.
sentence.Network_cn: 外向者倾向社交活跃, 爱说话,有高度兴趣加入人群.
